nodes.text: The Sphere of Scientific Advancement was one of the five Spheres of Influence of the reconstituted Sith Empire that was created by Empress Acina after the Eternal Empire conquest. The Sphere was the combination of the Spheres of Technology and Biotic Science and was led by Dark Council member Darth Malora until her removal from the position.

The Sphere of Scientific Advancement was a power-base of the Sith Empire responsible for scientific, technological, and biotic research. It was established by Empress Acina to lessen the infighting between Dark Council members. It was one of the five seats that succeeded the twelve Spheres of Influence. The Sphere was led by Darth Malora, the former apprentice to Lord Renning until she was removed from the position following the events on Ossus. She was replaced by Darth Savik.
